659150.name: Dark Train: Coupe
659150.description:
Dark Train: Coupe is a steampunk visual novel made of paper, story prequel to Dark Train. Be a passenger, listen, discuss and decide what will happen next during your journey through the Border City. Meet Ann Tagrezbung; she is quite lovely, unmechanical and still human...




* rich dialogues
* decision-based story progression
* tons of text and reading
* you will suffer by reading
* non-reading gameplay doesn’t exist here… well, maybe a little…



When you begin your journey, there is no way to turn back or stop the train. Travel through the city, learn about the Dark Train world, explore the mythology of The Border City and the ways of the existence of its people.

All of that within one mysterious train coupe...




The main story arc is played in the passenger train on the same railroad and you will not venture forth. Both stories are therefore located in the same place - The Border City - but in a different time. You will also meet the main protagonist Ann Tagrezbung from the first game.
659150.supported_languages:
英语*, 捷克语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
